meanings.definition: The children of one's son or daughter.
meanings.sent1: My grandchildren love to play in the park.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys spending time with her grandchildren every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous grandchildren hid all the cookies in the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the house as her grandchildren's giggles filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The bond between grandparents and grandchildren is truly special.
